name: TEARS IN RAIN
description:
A transformative take on a photo by Indro Muktiono. 

My second experiment at generative art. Prompted an AI to generate a painting based on my original night city photo, and then I animated the result through multi-layered motion techniques to add depth and parallax effects.  

This time, I went further by adding some graphics and drawings.

Jakarta, October 26, 2021.
 1440 × 2160 seamlessly looping MP4.
